category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 23 (Preparation and compliance with standard work safety rules)
contents: Article 23 (Preparation and compliance with standard work safety rules) ① In order to prevent work behavior with a high risk of disaster for each work performed, the chairman of the board shall prepare and distribute standard work safety rules that reflect the safety rules and educate workers on the relevant work. Revised on December 22, 2021, December 16, 2022, ② All workers (including executives) of the corporation must follow the standard work safety rules.
